meanings.definition: A method of producing radiographs using xerographic techniques.
meanings.sent1: The hospital used xeroradiography to take pictures of my broken bone.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on xeroradiography to see inside the body without surgery.
meanings.sent3: When the xeroradiography machine broke down, it started printing funny pictures instead of medical images.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like xeroradiography, capturing every detail with precision.
meanings.sent5: The xeroradiography revealed a hidden fracture that was missed in the initial examination.

meanings.definition: The process of creating medical images using xeroradiography.
meanings.sent1: Xeroradiography is an important tool in diagnosing illnesses accurately.
meanings.sent2: The technician specialized in xeroradiography to help patients get the best treatment.
meanings.sent3: During the hospital's talent show, the xeroradiography machine surprised everyone by displaying colorful images instead of X-rays.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like xeroradiography, capturing the joy in every moment.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the xeroradiography allowed the doctor to identify the problem swiftly.
